Class LibraryManagementSystem

java.lang.Object
LibraryManagementSystem
public class LibraryManagementSystem extends Object
The core class for the Library Management System. Manages the library collection, database initialization, and book transactions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LibraryManagementSystem()
    Constructs a new LibraryManagementSystem.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkInBookByBarcode(int barcode)
    Checks in a book by updating its status and due date in the database and local collection.
    boolean
    checkOutBookByBarcode(int barcode)
    Checks out a book by updating its status and due date in the database and local collection.
    List<Book>
    listAllBooks()
    Retrieves a list of all books in the collection.

  • Constructor Details

    • LibraryManagementSystem

      public LibraryManagementSystem()
      Constructs a new LibraryManagementSystem. Initializes the database and loads books from the database on creation.

  • Method Details

    • listAllBooks

      public List<Book> listAllBooks()
      Retrieves a list of all books in the collection.
      Returns:
      The list of books in the collection.

    • checkOutBookByBarcode

      public boolean checkOutBookByBarcode(int barcode)
      Checks out a book by updating its status and due date in the database and local collection.
      Parameters:
      barcode - The barcode of the book to check out.
      Returns:
      True if the book is successfully checked out, false otherwise.

    • checkInBookByBarcode

      public boolean checkInBookByBarcode(int barcode)
      Checks in a book by updating its status and due date in the database and local collection.
      Parameters:
      barcode - The barcode of the book to check in.
      Returns:
      True if the book is successfully checked in, false otherwise.
